Package fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.game

Class ShapeUpGameWithoutAdjacencyRule

java.lang.Object
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.game.AbstractShapeUpGame
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.game.ShapeUpGame
fr.utt.lo02.projet.model.game.ShapeUpGameWithoutAdjacencyRule
public class ShapeUpGameWithoutAdjacencyRule
extends ShapeUpGame
Represents the no adjacency mode of the game. It's the same as normal mode but without adjacency rule. It extends ShapeUpGame to follow the normal mode game's construction.

  • Field Summary

    • ShapeUpGameWithoutAdjacencyRule

      public ShapeUpGameWithoutAdjacencyRule​(IBoardVisitor visitor, java.util.List<Player> players, AbstractBoard board)
      Game's constructor. Sets up parameters.
      Parameters:
      visitor - the game's visitor. Used to calculate the score.
      players - the player's list. The list can contain 2 or 3 players.
      board - the game's board. It can be a rectangular, triangular or circular board.

  • Method Details

    • placeCardRequest

      public PlaceRequestResult placeCardRequest​(PlaceRequest placeRequest)
      Request to place a card from the player hand to a position on the board. We remove adjacency verification from the normal mode.
      Overrides:
      placeCardRequest in class AbstractShapeUpGame
      Parameters:
      placeRequest - place request from one player
      Returns:
      if the card has been placed or not
